entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain mixed with snow near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
